content: Look, I think we've got strong capital and funding levels, what we've focused on, particularly on consumers, is helping build the savings habits so that 80% of customers with less than Â£5000 in their deposit accounts, we've really targeted something called our digital regular saver on that. Look, I think what we're seeing is, from a business perspective, customers are largely wanting to stay transactional at this the smaller end, I talked a little bit about the example of bounce back loans still sitting in cash in people's transactional accounts, there's definitely a different behavior between sort of consumers and business and how they manage their deposits.
